Title: Oh, God! Book II
Writer: Josh Greenfeld (story), Josh Greenfeld (screenplay), Hal Goldman (screenplay), Fred S. Fox (screenplay), Seaman Jacobs (screenplay), Melissa Miller (screenplay), Avery Corman (novel)
Actors: George Burns, Suzanne Pleshette, David Birney, Louanne
Plot: Second 'Oh God' movie has God appearing before 11-year-old Tracy Richards to ask for her help to spread his word and influence over the world which she suggests the slogan 'Think God.' Naturaly, Tracy's divorced parents Paula and Don think Tracy's just crazy and plot to halt her 'heaven-sent' mission to spread God's word.
